response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the carrot into the saucepot. The next step is to turn on the stove to cook the carrot.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the carrot out of the fridge
(3) Put the carrot into the saucepot
(4) Turn on the stove
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_rgpphy_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
